languages.text: The daemon gains {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Демон получает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, равную его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}, а также иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозам варпа{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичному урону{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The daemon gains armour equal to its Willpower, immunity to perils of the warp, and immunity to toxic damage.
The daemon gains armour equal to its Willpower, immunity to perils of the warp, and immunity to toxic damage.

The daemon gains {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.

The daemon gains {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.

languages.text: Демон получает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, равную его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}, а также иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозам варпа{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичному урону{/g}.

Der Dämon erhält {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} in Höhe seiner {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} und Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxischen Schaden{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Dämon erhält Rüstung in Höhe seiner Willenskraft, Immunität gegen Gefahren des Warp und Immunität gegen toxischen {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g}.

languages.text: Le démon obtient des points d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} égaux à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, une immunité aux {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} et une immunité aux {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}.
languages.original_text: The daemon gains {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le démon obtient des points d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} égaux à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, une immunité aux {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} et une immunité aux {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}.

languages.text: 恶魔会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，额外护甲百分比等同于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}。此外，恶魔不会受到{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}影响。
languages.original_text: The daemon gains {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 恶魔会获得额外护甲，百分比等同于意志。此外，恶魔不会受到亚空间的威胁或毒素{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}影响。

languages.text: El daemon gana {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} igual a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y es inmune a las {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g} y al {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g}.
languages.original_text: The daemon gains {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El daemon gana armadura igual a su Voluntad y es inmune a las fatalidades de la disformidad y al {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} tóxico.

languages.text: このディーモンは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を得て、{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}<歪み>の危険{/g}を無効化し、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g}を無効化する。
languages.original_text: The daemon gains {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このディーモンは、意志力に等しいアーマーを得て、<歪み>の危険を無効化し、毒{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}を無効化する。

languages.text: İblis; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliğine eşit miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerine{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toksik hasara{/g} karşı bağışıklık kazanır.
